front.title: Proxy MIPv6 support for transient registrations

abstract.t: Proxy Mobile IPv6 is a network-based mobility protocol which provides IP mobility for a regular IPv6 mobile node without the involvement of the IPv6 host. This document specify an enhancement to enable Proxy MIPv6 protocol to support a transient proxy care-of address registration. This process allows the target mobile access gateway to request the local mobility anchor which host the mobile node binding cache entry to register a transient proxy care-of address and the direction of the associated traffic to enable the LMA to receive uplink traffic from two different proxy care-of addresses at the same time during the mobile node inter-MAG active handoff.
